entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
